edibble 0.0.0.9000

Reference

All functions

add_context()

Describe context related to experiment

add_edibble_vertex()

Add an edibble vertex

allocate_trts()

Define which unit to apply treatment

nclassics

A list of classical experimental designs

cross_edge_seq()

Make an edge sequence for every pair from two vectors

ed_levels()

Get all the levels of edibble variables as a list

edibble() new_edibble() not_edibble()

Make input edibble

eval_traits()

Evaluate traits

get_value_type()

Evaluate input value type

initiate_design()

Initiate the edibble design

is_edibble()

Test if the object is edibble

is_edibble_nexus()

Test if the object is an edibble nexus

linkabble()

Make a link table

measure_response()

Measure response of given units

n_units()

Number of units associated with the given variable

names_units() names_trts() names_resp() names_vars() names(<edbl_nexus>) `names<-`(<edbl_nexus>)

Names of variables

names_to_vnames()

Get the variable names given the vertex name of edibble nexus

ndigits()

Find how many digits

nested_in()

Specify the nesting structure for units

new_edibble_var()

Constructor for an edibble variable

number_si_prefix()

Numbers with SI prefix

plot(<edbl_nexus>)

Plot graph of edibble variables

print(<edbl_nexus>)

Print edibble nexus to terminal

pull(<edbl_nexus>)

Extract a single variable

randomise_trts()

Randomise treatments

replicabble()

Make a replicabble

sample_levels()

Sample a subset of the levels for the given variable

serve_table()

Serve edibble table

serve_table(<edbl_nexus>)

Serve edibble table

set_link()

Set the number of replicate in linkabble

set_trts()

Set the treatment variables

set_units()

Set units used in experiment

set_vars()

Set edibble variables

subset(<edbl_nexus>) subset_vars() subset_levels()

Subset an edibble nexus

tbl_sum(<edbl_df>)

Meta information print out for edibble

traits()

Helper to set the traits for edibble variable

traits_levels()

Helper function to create level names

trts_levels()

Unlike vars_levels, there is a check in place that it is a treatment.

type_sum(<edbl_unit>)

edibble unit

unit_to_trts()

Get the treatment variables for every unit
